description: The error message returned when trying to confirmResize or revertResize on an instance that hasn't been migrated is not helpful. The code currently wraps exception.MigrationNotFoundByStatus with a blank HTTPBadRequest. Adding a message specific to this case would be much better.
title: OSAPI confirm/revertResize error message unhelpful

comments.content: The error message returned when trying to confirmResize or revertResize on an instance that hasn't been migrated is not helpful. The code currently wraps exception.MigrationNotFoundByStatus with a blank HTTPBadRequest. Adding a message specific to this case would be much better.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content:
Hello Brian, or anyone else affected,

Accepted nova into oneiric-proposed, the package will build now and be available in a few hours. Please test and give feedback here. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/EnableProposed for documentation how to enable and use -proposed. Thank you in advance!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pitti
